add-extent-from-geokeywords-help: Search all keywords from thesaurus of type place and add matching extents.
addContactAsLink-help: Add a link to the contact in the contact directory. The contact will be updated if updated in the directory.
addContactAsText-help: Default mode. Add the contact into the record.
addFromThesaurus: or select them in a thesaurus
addOnlinesrcTitle: Link an online resource to the current metadata
addThumbnailTitle: Add an overview to the current metadata
beforeUnloadEditor: You may have unsaved changes since last save {{timeAgo}}.
cancelChangesFromNow: Cancel all changes since the start of the editing session {{timeAgo}}.
chooseAProj: Select the projection to use to display coordinates (note: coordinates are always saved in the metadata record in WGS84).
clickToDrawABox: Click once to enable control and draw a box. Click again to stop drawing.
createMetadataForGroup: Create and publish for group editors
createMetadataForGroup-help: The record will be editable by all members of the group
createMetadataNotAvailable: The record your are creating a metadata record from is either not available or has been deleted
datasetFound: Dataset found and added to map preview
importFromDir: Import from a folder on the server
linkToDatasetTitle: Link a dataset to the current metadata
linkToFeatureCatalogTitle: Link a feature catalog to the current metadata
linkToParentTitle: Link a parent metadata record to the current metadata
linkToServiceTitle: Link a service to the current metadata
linkToSourceTitle: Link a source dataset to the current metadata
metadataNotFound: Warning! Requested metadata with id {{id}} not found. Create a new one ?
noLayersForThumbnail: No layer defined in record to generate thumbnail from
noTemplatesAvailable: Warning! There is no templates available in the catalog. You should add or import some.
notFoundInThesaurus: Warning! Keywords {{keywords}} not found in thesaurus. This may happen when keywords are in a language that is not in the current user interface language. Multilingual keywords editing is not supported. Those keywords will not be modified by this editing session unless you remove this thesaurus section.
oneLanguage-help: Choose one language to edit using the selector
publishSuccess: Successful publication. Layer added to map preview
saveMetadataError: Error while saving metadata. You should reload the editor.
searchACRS: or search for a coordinate system ...
setDynamicGraphicOverview: Set graphic overview (using GetMap request URL)
share-help: Define who can view this record
thumbnailMaker-help: All WMS layers registered in the metadata record are added to the map. Choose a layout (Thumbnail recommended), a scale, zoom to the area of interest to generate the thumbnail.
to-iso19139-keyword-as-xlink-help: Useful for creating a link between the record and the thesaurus. An xlink:href attribute is added to the gmd:descriptiveKeywords element.
to-iso19139-keyword-help: Default mode. Insert keyword as simple text using gco:CharacterString element.
to-iso19139-keyword-with-anchor-help: Useful for having an hyperlink on the keyword which usually is the keyword identifier. A gmx:Anchor element is used for each keywords.
unsupportedSchemaAlert: Metadata {{title}} is using {{schema}} standard. This is not supported by the editor. Return to editor board.
validate-help: Check record against standard validation rules
9925: Australian Drainage Divisions and Major River Basins
14222: Interim Marine and Coastal Regionalisation of Australia (IMCRA)
307726: New Zealand Dependencies in the South West Pacific
308625: New Zealand Topographic map series (1:250,000 scale)
309019: Topographic map series (1:50,000 scale) for the New Zealand Chathams
309109: Topographic map series (1:50,000 scale) for the New Zealand mainland
